UPDATE el_role
name = #{name},
sorting = #{sorting},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
update_by = #{updateBy},
version = #{version},
update_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

mapper.select: SELECT r.name,r.code,r.sorting,r.status,r.remark,r.create_by,r.update_at,r.update_by, r.create_at,r.version,r.project_code,d.code as deptCode,d.name as deptName FROM el_role r left join el_department_role_mapping dr on r.code = dr.role_code left join el_department d on d.code = dr.dept_code WHERE r.code = #{code} AND r.status != 99 and dr.status != 99 and d.status != 99

FROM el_role WHERE name = #{name} AND status != 99

SELECT r.name,r.code,r.sorting,r.status,r.remark,r.create_by,r.update_at,r.update_by, r.create_at,r.version,r.project_code,d.code as deptCode,d.name as deptName FROM el_role r left join el_department_role_mapping dr on r.code = dr.role_code left join el_department d on d.code = dr.dept_code WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.status != 99 and dr.status != 99 and d.status != 99
